mxfile.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

mxCell.value: Empty UI is displayed with blank constraint file with the option to "save file", "open file",  "add constraints" "delete constraint", or "exit". Until a constraint is present "save file" and "delete constraint" are greyed out as an option and are not selectable as there are no constraints added.

Contents of temporary file is displayed with listed constraints. Each of which is selectable.
"save file" and  option is now available alongside "open file", "add constraint".
<font style="font-size: 10px;">All windows are closed. Temporary file is deleted.</font>
open small window prompting user to select directory or enter file path and a name for the file or cancel.
File is save. temporary file overwrites specified file or creates a copy at specified location with specified name
Selected constraint is highlighted and right hand side of the main window displays constraint options which are editable

Selected constraints are highlighted and right hand side of the main window displays common constraint options. If there are no constraints in common a "no common constraints" message is shown in it's place
<font style="font-size: 10px;">All windows are closed. Temporary file is deleted.</font>

How many 
constraints now
selected?
Constraints are removed from temporary file and display
selected constraint is no longer highlighted

Smaller window opens which display the constraints which can be added on the left. The options for adding constraints in the centre, and the about to be added constraints on the right. There is also a cancel button.
Selected constraint is set as current constraint. Options for specified constraint appear in centre of window which can be edited prior to adding to  "constraints to be added" list.
Edited constraint is pushed to "constraints to be added" list.
Cached YAML file is updated by iterating through list and adding each constraint

Selected constraint is set as current constraint. Options for specified constraint appear in centre of window which can be edited and edits will be stored in the specific list element selected. An "remove from list " constraint option becomes available.
Constraint is removed from "to be added" list.

Are there any 
more constraints
in to be added
 list?
Selected constraint is set as current constraint. Options for specified constraint appear in centre of window which can be edited prior to adding to  "constraints to be added" list.
Smaller window opens asking user to either select a file or to input a path to file or to cancel

Is 
the file a 
valid DQ robotics constraint 
file?
Error message in distinct colour text appears asking the user to select valid file
File path to opened file is saved. Contents of constraint file are loaded into temporary constraint file
